DEMO_007_MSG_010: ̀ȁ sat down and enjoyed the breakfast provided to him by his faithful robotic servant, Sancho.
DEMO_007_MSG_020: ̂Delightful, Master! You devoured that! That makes my circuits overcharged with joy, Master.
DEMO_007_MSG_030:
̂What are you planning for the rest of the day, Master?
ā
DEMO_007_MSG_040: ̂It's an awfully nice day out today. Perhaps another nap out in our wonderful little garden?Ă
DEMO_007_MSG_050:
̂That sounds delightful, Master. Please, do go relax in the garden to your heart's content.
ā
DEMO_007_MSG_060:
̂Hmm, then perhaps you would rather read a book
instead... Shall I fetch you a new book to read, Master?Ă
DEMO_007_MSG_070:
̂I'll get on it right away, Master! I'll have a new book ready for you to read in no time.
ā
DEMO_007_MSG_090:
Will you consider going outside to exercise, Master? 
I bet a short walk would do you wonders, Master.Ă
DEMO_007_MSG_100:
̂I'll meet you outside then, Master. Do take notice while you're out there... The garden is looking exquisite today.
ā
DEMO_007_MSG_110: ̂Enjoy them to your heart's content, Master.ā
DEMO_007_MSG_120:
̂How about going outside to chat with some of the friendly 
resident monsters, loitering about the garden, Master?Ă
DEMO_007_MSG_130: ̂Wonderful news! The Slime and Teeny Sanguini outside of the house is always are fun ones to make small talk with, Master.ā
DEMO_007_MSG_150:
̂Are you sure you don't want to at least continue your
nap out in the Garden?Ă
DEMO_007_MSG_160:
̂It sounds like just another delightful day here in Paradise.
ā
DEMO_007_MSG_170:
̂I sure love sharing this place with you, Master. It's so... safe. Nobody can ever take this away from us.
ā
DEMO_007_MSG_180:
̂Try not to forget, although it may be boring sometimes... You're completely free here.
ā
DEMO_007_MSG_190:
̂Oh! That reminds me... feel free to press the X-button 
to access your menu while you're out there.
